hints.content: The Statue of Liberty is $\purple{93}$ meters tall.

question.content:
The Leaning Tower of Pisa is $56$ meters tall.  The Statue of Liberty (including the pedestal) is $37$ meters taller than the Leaning Tower of Pisa.

**How tall is the Statue of Liberty?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] meters


![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/2b4ac714938a9eb69109fca5d06186c5.jpeg)$\qquad$![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/abfb29ad8cc397aa6e2e2df917fcbe1d.jpeg)
